channel.title: Buildah - Conatiner build env
channel.description:
Unlike pbuilder it makes use of namespaces and a container image to allow building packages for different Debian versions without needing chroot, root privileges and all the limitations that entails.
http://tauware.blogspot.com/2020/04/building-packages-with-buildah-in-debian.html
